GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
rpmsg: char: Avoid double destroy of default endpoint

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 3f20ef7a845c2c8d7ec82ecffa20d95cab5ecfeb, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit bea9b79c2d10fecf7bfa26e212ecefe61d232e39. For more details please see the references link.
